## Plot

```{r}
graph <- ggplot(adrs, aes(BMEASIFL, fill = AVALC, by = BMEASIFL)) +
  geom_bar(aes(BMEASIFL), position = "fill") +
  geom_text(stat = "prop", position = position_fill(.5)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  ylab("%")

graph
```
